entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:03 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
